          <title>
            <string language="en">Down's syndrome  chromosome translocation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unten Syndromchromosomversetzung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vers le bas translocation de chromosome de

            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para baixo translocation do chromosome do

            <string language="x-mt-es">Abajo desplazamiento del cromosoma del síndrome</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the translocation of chromosome 21 which causes Down's syndrome.</string>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la translocation du
